name: Aimo and Vermondo Riding Out to the Hunt
description: Aimo and Vermondo Riding Out to the Hunt; Attributed to Anovelo da Imbonate (Italian (Lombard), active about 1400); Milan, Lombardia, Italy; about 1400; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 25.6 x 18.4 cm (10 1/16 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. 26, fol. 2v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Aimo and Vermondo Riding Out to the Hunt
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
